t: Amazon vs. Etsy: The Best Platform to Start Selling Online
s: Etsy usually charges a $0.20 listing fee per item and a 6.5% transaction fee on each sale. Additionally, payment processing fees range from 3% to 4% depending on the seller’s location – much lower than Amazon Handmade’s 15%.

t: Etsy - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - Etsy, Inc. is an American e-commerce company with an emphasis on the selling of handmade or vintage items and craft supplies.
